abstract: We are visiting Paris this March! Honestly, your videos have been so helpful and entertaining! Keep up the amazing work~
Just bought it, we are going to Paris in June and look forward to checking out the spots in your guide!
I picked this up in January in preparation for trips in Feb and Oct...highly recommend!
